Question: In 2001, this person played a nun in the Kevin Smith comedy Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back.
Hints: In 1987, this person published her first novel, Postcards from the Edge.
Director Wes Craven's commentary on the Scream 3 DVD suggests that the sequence had, in fact, been written by this person herself.
This person published a sequel to Postcards, The Best Awful There Is, in 2004.
